column4: im trying to copy something from ubuntu to windows but it keeps saying i dont have permission. I setup the folder to be shared with all permissions though. :/
from windows it is telling me that i dont have permissions to copy an ubuntu share
check the file permissions to make sure you have r access
it changes the file permissions to allow the owner full acces, group and others read and execute premissions
what do i put in place of "file"?
